metadata.title: CVE-2016-2540 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Audacity before 2.1.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted FORMATCHUNKstructure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audacity - 2.1.2-1
audacity-data - 2.1.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audacity package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-1').
